mdx.excerpt: Sony MD LCD Remotes RM-MZ2S Supplied with MZ-R90, MZ-R91, MZ-E75, MZ-E90, MZ-E95, MZ-E77, & MZ-E800. This is a backlight remote with 9 character display as well…
